originalTitle: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
title: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
content: Sudan accuses Uganda of flouting international law by meeting Rapid Support Forces boss Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo.

originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: US envoy Huckabee tries to deny saying he would support Israel expansionism
title: US envoy Huckabee tries to deny saying he would support Israel expansionism
content: Rights advocate warns that failure to sack Huckabee 'will be read by the world as an endorsement of his views' by Trump.

originalTitle: Has BRICS given up on challenging Western economic dominance?
title: Has BRICS given up on challenging Western economic dominance?
content: Jim O’Neill, the economist who coined the term ‘BRIC’ 25 years ago, argues that the group is losing its relevance.

originalTitle: Sudan condemns RSF chief’s visit to Uganda as minimising ‘human values’
title: Sudan condemns RSF chief’s visit to Uganda as minimising ‘human values’
content: Uganda Ministry of Foreign Affairs says Mohamed Dagalo's meeting with President Yoweri Museveni focused on ending war.

originalTitle: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
title: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
content: Pakistan says the strikes were retaliation for recent suicide bombings in the country.

originalTitle: Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says
title: Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says
content: US envoy Steve Witkoff says the president is puzzled why Iran has not yet compromised in the face of a major American military build-up nearby.

originalTitle: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
title: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
content: Mike Huckabee suggested Israel would be justified in taking much of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.

title: How Sheff Wed's earliest-ever relegation unfolded
content: Sheffield Wednesday are the first EFL club to go down in February - here is how a season to forget unfolded.

originalTitle: Chelsea, Arsenal and Man City into Women's FA Cup quarters
title: Chelsea, Arsenal and Man City into Women's FA Cup quarters
content: Holders Chelsea edged out Manchester United to reach the quarter-finals of the Women's FA Cup, while Arsenal and Man City cruise through with comfortable wins.

originalTitle: 'Educate yourself and your kids' - Fofana and Mejbri racially abused
title: 'Educate yourself and your kids' - Fofana and Mejbri racially abused
content: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri and Chelsea defender Wesley Fofana have spoken out on social media after being sent racist abuse in the aftermath of the clubs' Premier League match on Saturday.
